column1: Top primary markets and top potential markets

column2: ote: The top primary markets for Sri Lanka have been identified using visitor arrivals data during the

column1: last six months. The previous methodology used to identify the markets was altered due to the current
arrival trends in the source markets and the economic crisis in Sri Lanka. The intention is to track these
source markets on a go-forward basis to understand future performance of Sri Lankaâ€™s tourism economy,
including during the projected international tourism recovery period, 2022-2025.
